and avoid being detected by enemies.
Title: Mock Kelp Pokémon

Name: Dragalge
Dex Entry:
Dragalge generates dragon energy by sticking
the plume on its head out above the ocean’s
surface and bathing it in sunlight.
Title: Mock Kelp Pokémon

Name: Clauncher
Dex Entry:
By detonating gas that accumulates in its right
claw, this Pokémon launches water like a bullet.
This is how Clauncher defeats its enemies.
Title: Water Gun Pokémon

Name: Clawitzer
Dex Entry:
Clawitzer’s right arm is a cannon that launches
projectiles made of seawater. Shots from a
Clawitzer’s cannon arm can sink a tanker.
Title: Howitzer Pokémon

Name: Helioptile
Dex Entry:
The sun powers this Pokémon’s electricity
generation. Interruption of that process
stresses Helioptile to the point of weakness.
Title: Generator Pokémon

Name: Heliolisk
Dex Entry:
One Heliolisk basking in the sun with its frill
outspread is all it would take to produce enough
electricity to power a city.
Title: Generator Pokémon

Name: Tyrunt
Dex Entry:
This Pokémon is selfish and likes to be pampered.
It can also inflict grievous wounds on its Trainer
just by playing around.
Title: Royal Heir Pokémon

Name: Tyrantrum
Dex Entry:
A single bite of Tyrantrum’s massive jaws will
demolish a car. This Pokémon was the king of the
ancient world.
Title: Despot Pokémon

Name: Amaura
Dex Entry:
Amaura is an ancient Pokémon that has gone
extinct. Specimens of this species can sometimes
be found frozen in ice.
Title: Tundra Pokémon

Name: Aurorus
Dex Entry:
When gripped by rage, Aurorus will emanate
freezing air, covering everything around it in ice.
Title: Tundra Pokémon

Name: Sylveon
Dex Entry:
It emits a soothing aura from its ribbon-shaped organs. It wraps
these appendages around quarrelers to instantly restore calm to
the situation.
Title: Intertwining Pokémon

Name: Hawlucha
Dex Entry:
It always strikes a pose before going for its
finishing move. Sometimes opponents take
advantage of that time to counterattack.
Title: Wrestling Pokémon

Name: Dedenne
Dex Entry:
Since Dedenne can’t generate much electricity on
its own, it steals electricity from outlets or other
electric Pokémon.
Title: Antenna Pokémon

Name: Carbink
Dex Entry:
It’s said that somewhere in the world, there’s
a mineral vein housing a large pack of slumbering
Carbink. It’s also said that this pack has a queen.
Title: Jewel Pokémon

Name: Goomy
Dex Entry:
Goomy hides away in the shade of trees, where it's nice and
humid. If the slime coating its body dries out, the Pokémon
instantly becomes lethargic.
Title: Soft Tissue Pokémon

Name: Sliggoo
Dex Entry: Although this Pokémon isn't very strong, its body is coated in a caustic slime that can melt through anything, so predators steer clear of it.
Title: Soft Tissue Pokémon

Name: Sliggoo
Dex Entry:
A creature given to melancholy. Its metallic shell
developed as a result of the mucus on its skin reacting with
the iron in Hisui's water.
Title: Snail Pokémon

Name: Goodra
Dex Entry: Its form of offense is forcefully stretching out its horns. The strikes land 100 times harder than any blow from a heavyweight boxer.
Title: Dragon Pokémon

Name: Goodra
Dex Entry:
Able to freely control the hardness of its metallic shell.
It loathes solitude and is extremely clingy—it will fume and
run riot if those dearest to it ever leave its side.
Title: Shell Bunker Pokémon

Name: Klefki
Dex Entry:
Klefki sucks in metal ions with the horn topping
its head. It seems this Pokémon loves keys so
much that its head needed to look like one, too.
Title: Key Ring Pokémon

Name: Phantump
Dex Entry:
With a voice like a human child’s, it cries out to
lure adults deep into the forest, getting them lost
among the trees.
Title: Stump Pokémon

Name: Trevenant
Dex Entry:
Small roots that extend from the tips of this
Pokémon’s feet can tie into the trees of the
forest and give Trevenant control over them.
Title: Elder Tree Pokémon

Name: Pumpkaboo
Dex Entry: Spirits that wander this world are placed into Pumpkaboo's body. They're then moved on to the afterlife.
Title: Pumpkin Pokémon

Name: Pumpkaboo
Dex Entry: When taking spirits to the afterlife, small Pumpkaboo prefer the spirits of children to those of adults.
Title: Pumpkin Pokémon

Name: Pumpkaboo
Dex Entry: When taking spirits to the afterlife, large Pumpkaboo prefer the spirits of adults to those of children.
Title: Pumpkin Pokémon

Name: Pumpkaboo
Dex Entry: Supersized Pumpkaboo are very partial to the spirits of people who were of similarly superior proportions.
Title: Pumpkin Pokémon

Name: Gourgeist
Dex Entry: Eerie cries emanate from its body in the dead of night. The sounds are said to be the wails of spirits who are suffering in the afterlife.
Title: Pumpkin Pokémon

Name: Gourgeist
Dex Entry: Small Gourgeist pretend to be children to fool adults. Anyone who falls for the act gets carried away to the hereafter.
Title: Pumpkin Pokémon

Name: Gourgeist
Dex Entry: Large Gourgeist put on the guise of adults, taking the hands of children to lead them to the afterlife.
Title: Pumpkin Pokémon

Name: Gourgeist
Dex Entry: Supersized Gourgeist aren't picky. They will forcefully drag anyone off to the afterlife.
Title: Pumpkin Pokémon

Name: Bergmite
Dex Entry:
Lives on mountains blanketed in perennial snow. It freezes water
vapor in the air to make the ice helmet that it dons for defense.
Title: Ice Chunk Pokémon

Name: Avalugg
Dex Entry: This Pokémon uses its massive icy body to flatten anything that gets in its way. When it's floating out on the ocean, it looks exactly like drift ice
Title: Iceberg Pokémon

Name: Avalugg
Dex Entry:
The armor of ice covering its lower jaw puts steel to shame and
can shatter rocks with ease. This Pokémon barrels along steep
mountain paths, cleaving through the deep snow.
Title: Iceberg Pokémon

Name: Noibat
Dex Entry:
No wavelength of sound is beyond Noibat’s
ability to produce. The ultrasonic waves it
generates can overcome much larger Pokémon.
Title: Sound Wave Pokémon

Name: Noivern
Dex Entry:
Flying through the darkness, it weakens enemies
with ultrasonic waves that could crush stone.
Its fangs finish the fight.
Title: Sound Wave Pokémon

Name: Xerneas
Dex Entry:
When the horns on its head shine
in seven colors, it is said to be
sharing everlasting life.
Title: Life Pokémon

Name: Yveltal
Dex Entry:
When its life comes to an end, it absorbs
the life energy of every living thing
and turns into a cocoon once more.
Title: Destruction Pokémon

Name: Zygarde
Dex Entry:
Some say it can change to an even more
powerful form when battling those who threaten
the ecosystem.
Title: Order Pokémon

Name: Zygarde
Dex Entry: Born when around 10% of Zygarde's cells have been gathered from all over, this form is skilled in close-range combat.
Title: Order Pokémon

Name: Zygarde
Dex Entry: Born when all of Zygarde's cells have been gathered together, it uses force to neutralize those who harm the ecosystem.
Title: Order Pokémon

Name: Diancie
Dex Entry: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.
Title: Jewel Pokémon

Name: Diancie
Dex Entry:
It can instantly create many diamonds
by compressing the carbon in the air
between its hands.
Title: Jewel Pokémon

Name: Hoopa
Dex Entry:
It is said to be able to seize anything it desires
with its six rings and six huge arms. With its power
sealed, it is transformed into a much smaller form.
Title: Mischief Pokémon

Name: Hoopa
Dex Entry: In its true form, it possess a huge amount of power. Legends of its avarice tell how it once carried off an entire castle to gain the treasure hidden within.
Title: Djinn Pokémon

Name: Volcanion
Dex Entry:
It expels its internal steam from the
arms on its back. It has enough
power to blow away a mountain.
Title: Steam Pokémon

Name: Rowlet
Dex Entry:
Flies noiselessly on delicate wings. It has mastered the art of
deftly launching dagger-sharp feathers from those same wings.
Title: Grass Quill Pokémon

Name: Dartrix
Dex Entry:
Regularly basks in sunlight to gather power—presumably due to
the frigid climate. Nonetheless, the edges of the blade quills set
into its wings are keen as ever.
Title: Blade Quill Pokémon

Name: Decidueye
Dex Entry: In a tenth of a second, it can nock and fire an arrow quill, piercing an opponent's weak point before they notice what's happening.
Title: Arrow Quill Pokémon

Name: Decidueye
Dex Entry:
The air stored inside the rachises of Decidueye's feathers
insulates the Pokémon against Hisui's extreme cold. This is
firm proof that evolution can be influenced by environment.
Title: Arrow Quill Pokémon

Name: Litten
Dex Entry:
Trying to pet Litten before it trusts you will
result in a nasty scratch from its sharp claws.
Be careful.
Title: Fire Cat Pokémon

Name: Torracat
Dex Entry:
When facing a powerful enemy, Torracat’s
fighting spirit gets pumped up, and its fire bell
blazes hotter.
Title: Fire Cat Pokémon

Name: Incineroar
Dex Entry:
Incineroar’s rough and aggressive behavior is its
most notable trait, but the way it helps out small
Pokémon shows that it has a kind side as well.
Title: Heel Pokémon

Name: Popplio
Dex Entry:
If Popplio want to create big, powerful balloons,
they must be persistent. It takes daily practice for
these Pokémon to develop their skills.
Title: Sea Lion Pokémon

Name: Brionne
Dex Entry:
On nights when the sea is calm, Brionne dance
with one another to the singing of the Primarina
that’s leading them.
Title: Pop Star Pokémon

Name: Primarina
Dex Entry:
For Primarina, every battle’s a stage. Its singing
and the dancing of its balloons will mesmerize
the audience.
Title: Soloist Pokémon

Name: Pikipek
Dex Entry:
It may look spindly, but its neck muscles are
heavy-duty. It can peck at a tree 16 times
per second!
Title: Woodpecker Pokémon

Name: Trumbeak
Dex Entry:
From its mouth, it fires the seeds of berries
it has eaten. The scattered seeds give rise
to new plants.
Title: Bugle Beak Pokémon

Name: Toucannon
Dex Entry:
Known for forming harmonious couples, this
Pokémon is brought to wedding ceremonies as a
good luck charm.
Title: Cannon Pokémon

Name: Yungoos
Dex Entry:
Although it will eat anything, it prefers fresh
living things, so it marches down streets
in search of prey.
Title: Loitering Pokémon

Name: Gumshoos
Dex Entry:
Patient by nature, this Pokémon loses control of
itself and pounces when it spots its favorite
meal—Rattata!
Title: Stakeout Pokémon

Name: Grubbin
Dex Entry:
It uses its big jaws to dig nests into the forest
floor, and it loves to feed on sweet tree sap.
Title: Larva Pokémon

Name: Charjabug
Dex Entry:
Its digestive processes convert the leaves it eats
into electricity. An electric sac in its belly stores
the electricity for later use.
Title: Battery Pokémon

Name: Vikavolt
Dex Entry:
If it carries a Charjabug to use as a spare battery,
a flying Vikavolt can rapidly fire high-powered
beams of electricity.
Title: Stag Beetle Pokémon

Name: Crabrawler
Dex Entry:
Crabrawler has been known to mistake
Exeggutor for a coconut tree and climb it. The
enraged Exeggutor shakes it off and stomps it.
Title: Boxing Pokémon

Name: Crabominable
Dex Entry:
Before it stops to think, it just starts pummeling.
There are records of its turning back
avalanches with a flurry of punches.
Title: Woolly Crab Pokémon

Name: Oricorio
Dex Entry: This Oricorio has drunk red nectar. If its Trainer gives the wrong order, this passionate Pokémon becomes fiercely angry.
Title: Dancing Pokémon

Name: Oricorio
Dex Entry: This Oricorio has drunk bright yellow nectar. When it sees someone looking glum, it will try to cheer them up with a dance.
Title: Dancing Pokémon

Name: Oricorio
Dex Entry: This Oricorio has sipped pink nectar. It gets so caught up in its dancing that it sometimes doesn't hear its Trainer's orders.
Title: Dancing Pokémon

Name: Oricorio
Dex Entry: This Oricorio has sipped purple nectar. Some dancers use its graceful, elegant dancing as inspiration.
Title: Dancing Pokémon

Name: Cutiefly
Dex Entry:
An opponent’s aura can tell Cutiefly what that
opponent’s next move will be. Then Cutiefly can
glide around the attack and strike back.
Title: Bee Fly Pokémon

Name: Ribombee
Dex Entry:
Ribombee absolutely hate getting wet or
rained on. In the cloudy Galar region,
they are very seldom seen.
Title: Bee Fly Pokémon

Name: Rockruff
Dex Entry:
This Pokémon intimidates opponents by striking
the ground with the rocks on its neck. The
moment an opponent flinches, Rockruff attacks.
Title: Puppy Pokémon

Name: Rockruff
Dex Entry: When it rubs the rocks on its neck against you, that's proof of its love for you. However, the rocks are sharp, so the gesture is quite painful!
Title: Puppy Pokémon

Name: Lycanroc
Dex Entry:
With swift movements, this Pokémon gradually
backs its prey into a corner. Lycanroc’s fangs are
always aimed toward opponents’ weak spots.
Title: Wolf Pokémon

Name: Lycanroc
Dex Entry: It's invigorated by powerful opponents–the stronger the better. A full-force headbutt from one of these Lycanroc can shatter giant boulders.
Title: Wolf Pokémon

Name: Lycanroc
Dex Entry: These Pokémon have both calm and ferocious qualities. Their temperamental nature makes them a difficult species to raise.
Title: Wolf Pokémon

Name: Wishiwashi
Dex Entry:
When it senses danger, its eyes tear up.
The sparkle of its tears signals other
Wishiwashi to gather.
Title: Small Fry Pokémon

Name: Wishiwashi
Dex Entry: When facing tough opponents, they get into formation. But if they get wounded in battle, they'll scatter and become solitary again.
Title: Small Fry Pokémon

Name: Mareanie
Dex Entry:
Unlike their Alolan counterparts, the Mareanie
of the Galar region have not yet figured out
that the branches of Corsola are delicious.
Title: Brutal Star Pokémon

Name: Toxapex
Dex Entry:
Within the poison sac in its body is a poison so
toxic that Pokémon as large as Wailord will still
be suffering three days after it first takes effect.
Title: Brutal Star Pokémon

Name: Mudbray
Dex Entry:
It eats dirt to create mud and smears this mud all
over its feet, giving them the grip needed to walk
on rough terrain without slipping.
Title: Donkey Pokémon

Name: Mudsdale
Dex Entry:
Mudsdale has so much stamina that it could carry
over 10 tons across the Galar region without rest
or sleep.
Title: Draft Horse Pokémon

Name: Dewpider
Dex Entry:
Dewpider normally lives underwater. When it
comes onto land in search of food, it takes
water with it in the form of a bubble on its head.
Title: Water Bubble Pokémon

Name: Araquanid
Dex Entry:
It acts as a caretaker for Dewpider, putting them
inside its bubble and letting them eat any
leftover food.
Title: Water Bubble Pokémon

Name: Fomantis
Dex Entry:
During the day, Fomantis basks in sunlight and
sleeps peacefully. It wakes and moves around
at night.
Title: Sickle Grass Pokémon

Name: Lurantis
Dex Entry:
The petals on this Pokémon’s arms are thin and
super sharp, and they can fire laser beams if
Lurantis gathers light first.
Title: Bloom Sickle Pokémon

Name: Morelull
Dex Entry:
Morelull live in forests that stay dark even
during the day. They scatter flickering spores
that put enemies to sleep.
Title: Illuminating Pokémon

Name: Shiinotic
Dex Entry:
If you see a light deep in a forest at night,
don’t go near. Shiinotic will make you fall
fast asleep.
Title: Illuminating Pokémon

Name: Salandit
Dex Entry:
This sneaky Pokémon will slink behind its prey
and immobilize it with poisonous gas before the
prey even realizes Salandit is there.
Title: Toxic Lizard Pokémon

Name: Salazzle
Dex Entry:
The winner of competitions between Salazzle
is decided by which one has the most male
Salandit with it.
Title: Toxic Lizard Pokémon

Name: Stufful
Dex Entry:
The way it protects itself by flailing its arms may
be an adorable sight, but stay well away. This is
flailing that can snap thick tree trunks.
Title: Flailing Pokémon

Name: Bewear
Dex Entry:
The moves it uses to take down its prey would
make a martial artist jealous. It tucks subdued
prey under its arms to carry them to its nest.
Title: Strong Arm Pokémon

Name: Bounsweet
Dex Entry:
When under attack, it secretes a sweet
and delicious sweat. The scent only calls
more enemies to it.
Title: Fruit Pokémon

Name: Steenee
Dex Entry:
Any Corvisquire that pecks at this
Pokémon will be greeted with a smack from
its sepals followed by a sharp kick.
Title: Fruit Pokémon

Name: Tsareena
Dex Entry:
A kick from the hardened tips of this Pokémon’s
legs leaves a wound in the opponent’s body and
soul that will never heal.
Title: Fruit Pokémon

Name: Comfey
Dex Entry:
These Pokémon smell very nice. All Comfey wear
different flowers, so each of these Pokémon has
its own individual scent.
Title: Posy Picker Pokémon

Name: Oranguru
Dex Entry:
It knows the forest inside and out. If it comes
across a wounded Pokémon, Oranguru will
gather medicinal herbs to treat it.
Title: Sage Pokémon

Name: Passimian
Dex Entry:
Passimian live in groups of about 20, with
each member performing an assigned role.
Through cooperation, the group survives.
Title: Teamwork Pokémon

Name: Wimpod
Dex Entry:
Wimpod gather in swarms, constantly on the
lookout for danger. They scatter the moment
they detect an enemy’s presence.
Title: Turn Tail Pokémon

Name: Golisopod
Dex Entry:
They live in sunken ships or in holes in the
seabed. When Golisopod and Grapploct
battle, the loser becomes the winner’s meal.
Title: Hard Scale Pokémon

Name: Sandygast
Dex Entry:
Sandygast mainly inhabits beaches. It takes
control of anyone who puts their hand into its
mouth, forcing them to make its body bigger.
Title: Sand Heap Pokémon

Name: Palossand
Dex Entry:
This Pokémon lives on beaches, but it hates
water. Palossand can’t maintain its castle-like
shape if it gets drenched by a heavy rain.
Title: Sand Castle Pokémon

Name: Pyukumuku
Dex Entry:
It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it encounters a
foe, it will spit out its internal organs as a means
to punch them.
Title: Sea Cucumber Pokémon

Name: Type: Null
Dex Entry:
It was modeled after a mighty Pokémon of myth.
The mask placed upon it limits its power in order
to keep it under control.
Title: Synthetic Pokémon

Name: Silvally
Dex Entry:
The final factor needed to release this
Pokémon’s true power was a strong bond
with a Trainer it trusts.
Title: Synthetic Pokémon

Name: Minior
Dex Entry:
Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable,
the shock of falling to the ground smashes the
shell to smithereens.
Title: Meteor Pokémon

Name: Minior
Dex Entry: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
Title: Meteor Pokémon

Name: Minior
Dex Entry: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
Title: Meteor Pokémon

Name: Minior
Dex Entry: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
Title: Meteor Pokémon

Name: Minior
Dex Entry: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
Title: Meteor Pokémon

Name: Minior
Dex Entry: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
Title: Meteor Pokémon

Name: Minior
Dex Entry: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
Title: Meteor Pokémon

Name: Minior
Dex Entry: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.
Title: Meteor Pokémon

Name: Komala
Dex Entry:
It remains asleep from birth to death as a result
of the sedative properties of the leaves that
form its diet.
Title: Drowsing Pokémon

Name: Turtonator
Dex Entry:
Eating sulfur in its volcanic habitat is what causes
explosive compounds to develop in its shell.
Its droppings are also dangerously explosive.
Title: Blast Turtle Pokémon

Name: Togedemaru
Dex Entry:
When it’s in trouble, it curls up into a ball, makes
its fur spikes stand on end, and then discharges
electricity indiscriminately.
Title: Roly-Poly Pokémon

Name: Mimikyu
Dex Entry:
There was a scientist who peeked under
Mimikyu’s old rag in the name of research.
The scientist died of a mysterious disease.
Title: Disguise Pokémon

Name: Bruxish
Dex Entry:
Its skin is thick enough to fend off Mareanie’s
spikes. With its robust teeth, Bruxish crunches
up the spikes and eats them.
Title: Gnash Teeth Pokémon

Name: Drampa
Dex Entry:
Drampa is a kind and friendly Pokémon—up until
it’s angered. When that happens, it stirs up a
gale and flattens everything around.
Title: Placid Pokémon

Name: Dhelmise
Dex Entry:
After lowering its anchor, it waits for its prey. It
catches large Wailord and drains their life-force.
Title: Sea Creeper Pokémon

Name: Jangmo-o
Dex Entry:
Jangmo-o strikes its scales to communicate with
others of its kind. Its scales are actually fur that’s
become as hard as metal.
Title: Scaly Pokémon

Name: Hakamo-o
Dex Entry:
Before attacking its enemies, it clashes its
scales together and roars. Its sharp claws
shred the opposition.
Title: Scaly Pokémon

Name: Kommo-o
Dex Entry:
Certain ruins have paintings of ancient warriors
wearing armor made of Kommo-o scales.
Title: Scaly Pokémon

Name: Tapu Koko
Dex Entry:
The lightning-wielding guardian deity of
Melemele, Tapu Koko is brimming with curiosity
and appears before people from time to time.
Title: Land Spirit Pokémon

Name: Tapu Lele
Dex Entry:
Although called a guardian deity, Tapu Lele is
devoid of guilt about its cruel disposition and
can be described as nature incarnate.
Title: Land Spirit Pokémon

Name: Tapu Bulu
Dex Entry:
It makes ringing sounds with its tail to let others
know where it is, avoiding unneeded conflicts.
This guardian deity of Ula’ula controls plants.
Title: Land Spirit Pokémon

Name: Tapu Fini
Dex Entry:
Although it’s called a guardian deity, terrible
calamities sometimes befall those who
recklessly approach Tapu Fini.
Title: Land Spirit Pokémon

Name: Cosmog
Dex Entry:
Cosmog is very curious but not very cautious,
often placing itself in danger. If things start to
look dicey, it teleports away.
Title: Nebula Pokémon

Name: Cosmoem
Dex Entry:
It sucks in dust from the air at an astounding rate,
frantically building up energy within its core as
preparation for evolution.
Title: Protostar Pokémon

Name: Solgaleo
Dex Entry:
Solgaleo was once known as the Beast That
Devours the Sun. Energy in the form of light
radiates boundlessly from it.
Title: Sunne Pokémon

Name: Lunala
Dex Entry:
It steals the light from its surroundings and then
becomes the full moon, showering its own light
across the night sky.
Title: Moone Pokémon

Name: Nihilego
Dex Entry:
It appeared in this world from an Ultra
Wormhole. Nihilego appears to be a parasite
that lives by feeding on people and Pokémon.
Title: Parasite Pokémon

Name: Buzzwole
Dex Entry:
Buzzwole goes around showing off its
abnormally swollen muscles. It is one kind
of Ultra Beast.
Title: Swollen Pokémon

Name: Pheromosa
Dex Entry:
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger
here, it’s apparently a common organism in the
world where it normally lives.
Title: Lissome Pokémon

Name: Xurkitree
Dex Entry:
They’ve been dubbed Ultra Beasts. Some of
them stand unmoving, like trees, with their
arms and legs stuck into the ground.
Title: Glowing Pokémon

Name: Celesteela
Dex Entry:
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger
here, it’s apparently a common organism in the
world where it normally lives.
Title: Launch Pokémon

Name: Kartana
Dex Entry:
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger
here, it’s apparently a common organism in the
world where it normally lives.
Title: Drawn Sword Pokémon

Name: Guzzlord
Dex Entry:
An unknown life-form called a UB. It may be
constantly hungry—it is certainly always
devouring something.
Title: Junkivore Pokémon

Name: Necrozma
Dex Entry:
It needs light to survive, and it goes on a
rampage seeking it out. Its laser beams will
cut anything to pieces.
Title: Prism Pokémon

Name: Necrozma
Dex Entry: This is Necrozma's form while it's absorbing the power of Solgaleo, making it extremely ferocious and impossible to control.
Title: Prism Pokémon

Name: Necrozma
Dex Entry: This is its form while it's devouring the light of Lunala. It grasps foes in its giant claws and rips them apart with brute force.
Title: Prism Pokémon

Name: Necrozma
Dex Entry: The light pouring out from all over its body affects living things and nature, impacting them in various ways.
Title: Prism Pokémon

Name: Magearna
Dex Entry:
Built roughly 500 years ago by a scientist,
the part called the Soul-Heart is the
actual life-form.
Title: Artificial Pokémon

Name: Magearna
Dex Entry: This beautiful form reflects Magearna's appearance when first presented to a king's daughter 500 years ago.
Title: Artificial Pokémon

Name: Marshadow
Dex Entry:
This Pokémon can conceal itself in any shadow,
so it went undiscovered for a long time.
Title: Gloomdweller Pokémon

Name: Poipole
Dex Entry:
An Ultra Beast that lives in a different world, it
cackles wildly as it sprays its opponents with
poison from the needles on its head.
Title: Poison Pin Pokémon

Name: Naganadel
Dex Entry:
One kind of Ultra Beast, it fires a glowing,
venomous liquid from its needles. This liquid
is also immensely adhesive.
Title: Poison Pin Pokémon

Name: Stakataka
Dex Entry:
When stone walls started moving and attacking,
the brute’s true identity was this mysterious
life-form, which brings to mind an Ultra Beast.
Title: Rampart Pokémon

Name: Blacephalon
Dex Entry:
A UB that appeared from an Ultra Wormhole, it
causes explosions, then takes advantage of
opponents’ surprise to rob them of their vitality.
Title: Fireworks Pokémon

Name: Zeraora
Dex Entry:
Electricity sparks from the pads on its limbs.
Wherever Zeraora runs, lightning flashes and
thunder echoes.
Title: Thunderclap Pokémon

Name: Meltan
Dex Entry:
They live as a group, but when the time comes,
one strong Meltan will absorb all the others
and evolve.
Title: Hex Nut Pokémon

Name: Melmetal
Dex Entry:
Centrifugal force is behind the punches of
Melmetal’s heavy hex-nut arms. Melmetal is said
to deliver the strongest punches of all Pokémon.
Title: Hex Nut Pokémon

Name: Melmetal
Dex Entry: In a distant land, there are legends about a cyclopean giant. In fact, the giant was a Melmetal that was flooded with Gigantamax energy.
Title: Hex Nut Pokémon

Name: Grookey
Dex Entry:
It attacks with rapid beats of its stick.
As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets
more and more pumped.
Title: Chimp Pokémon

Name: Thwackey
Dex Entry:
When it’s drumming out rapid beats in battle, it
gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won’t even
notice that it’s already knocked out its opponent.
Title: Beat Pokémon

Name: Rillaboom
Dex Entry:
The one with the best drumming techniques
becomes the boss of the troop. It has a gentle
disposition and values harmony among its group.
Title: Drummer Pokémon

Name: Rillaboom
Dex Entry: Rillaboom has become one with its forest of drums and continues to lay down beats that shake all of Galar.
Title: Drummer Pokémon

Name: Scorbunny
Dex Entry:
It has special pads on the backs of its feet, and
one on its nose. Once it’s raring to fight, these
pads radiate tremendous heat.
Title: Rabbit Pokémon

Name: Raboot
Dex Entry:
It kicks berries right off the branches of trees
and then juggles them with its feet, practicing
its footwork.
Title: Rabbit Pokémon

Name: Cinderace
Dex Entry:
It’s skilled at both offense and defense, and it
gets pumped up when cheered on. But if it starts
showboating, it could put itself in a tough spot.
Title: Striker Pokémon

Name: Cinderace
Dex Entry: Infused with Cinderace's fighting spirit, the gigantic Pyro Ball never misses its targets and completely roasts opponents.
Title: Striker Pokémon

Name: Sobble
Dex Entry:
When it gets wet, its skin changes color,
and this Pokémon becomes invisible as if
it were camouflaged.
Title: Water Lizard Pokémon

Name: Drizzile
Dex Entry:
Highly intelligent but also very lazy,
it keeps enemies out of its territory
by laying traps everywhere.
Title: Water Lizard Pokémon

Name: Inteleon
Dex Entry:
Its nictitating membranes let it pick out foes’
weak points so it can precisely blast them with
water that shoots from its fingertips at Mach 3.
Title: Secret Agent Pokémon

Name: Inteleon
Dex Entry: It has excellent sniping skills. Shooting a berry rolling along over nine miles away is a piece of cake for this Pokémon.
Title: Secret Agent Pokémon

Name: Skwovet
Dex Entry:
It eats berries nonstop—a habit that has made
it more resilient than it looks. It’ll show up on
farms, searching for yet more berries.
Title: Cheeky Pokémon

Name: Greedent
Dex Entry:
Common throughout the Galar region, this
Pokémon has strong teeth and can chew
through the toughest of berry shells.
Title: Greedy Pokémon

Name: Rookidee
Dex Entry:
Jumping nimbly about, this small-bodied
Pokémon takes advantage of even the slightest
opportunity to disorient larger opponents.
Title: Tiny Bird Pokémon

Name: Corvisquire
Dex Entry:
The lessons of many harsh battles have taught it
how to accurately judge an opponent’s strength.
Title: Raven Pokémon

Name: Corviknight
Dex Entry:
With their great intellect and flying skills, these
Pokémon very successfully act as the Galar
region’s airborne taxi service.
Title: Raven Pokémon

Name: Corviknight
Dex Entry: The eight feathers on its back are called blade birds, and they can launch off its body to attack foes independently.
Title: Raven Pokémon

Name: Blipbug
Dex Entry:
Often found in gardens, this Pokémon has hairs
on its body that it uses to assess its surroundings.
Title: Larva Pokémon

Name: Dottler
Dex Entry:
As it grows inside its shell, it uses its psychic
abilities to monitor the outside world and
prepare for evolution.
Title: Radome Pokémon

Name: Orbeetle
Dex Entry:
It emits psychic energy to observe and study
what’s around it—and what’s around it can
include things over six miles away.
Title: Seven Spot Pokémon

Name: Orbeetle
Dex Entry: Its brain has grown to a gargantuan size, as has the rest of its body. This Pokémon's intellect and psychic abilities are overpowering.
Title: Seven Spot Pokémon

Name: Nickit
Dex Entry:
Cunning and cautious, this Pokémon survives by
stealing food from others. It erases its tracks with
swipes of its tail as it makes off with its plunder.
Title: Fox Pokémon

Name: Thievul
Dex Entry:
With a lithe body and sharp claws, it goes
around stealing food and eggs. Boltund
is its natural enemy.
Title: Fox Pokémon

Name: Gossifleur
Dex Entry:
It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous
song. This delightful display has charmed many
into raising this Pokémon.
Title: Flowering Pokémon

Name: Eldegoss
Dex Entry:
The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be
spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn—a Galar
regional specialty.
Title: Cotton Bloom Pokémon

Name: Wooloo
Dex Entry:
If its fleece grows too long, Wooloo won’t be
able to move. Cloth made with the wool of this
Pokémon is surprisingly strong.
Title: Sheep Pokémon

Name: Dubwool
Dex Entry:
Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the
opposite gender. They never see use in battle.
Title: Sheep Pokémon

Name: Chewtle
Dex Entry:
It starts off battles by attacking with its rock-hard
horn, but as soon as the opponent flinches, this
Pokémon bites down and never lets go.
Title: Snapping Pokémon

Name: Drednaw
Dex Entry:
This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck
to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and
take them down.
Title: Bite Pokémon

Name: Drednaw
Dex Entry:
This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck
to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and
take them down.
Title: Bite Pokémon

Name: Yamper
Dex Entry:
This gluttonous Pokémon only assists people with
their work because it wants treats. As it runs,
it crackles with electricity.
Title: Puppy Pokémon

Name: Boltund
Dex Entry:
It sends electricity through its legs to boost their
strength. Running at top speed, it easily breaks
50 mph.
Title: Dog Pokémon

Name: Rolycoly
Dex Entry:
It can race around like a unicycle, even on rough,
rocky terrain. Burning coal sustains it.
Title: Coal Pokémon

Name: Carkol
Dex Entry:
By rapidly rolling its legs, it can travel at over
18 mph. The temperature of the flames it
breathes exceeds 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.
Title: Coal Pokémon

Name: Coalossal
Dex Entry:
While it’s engaged in battle, its mountain of coal
will burn bright red, sending off sparks that
scorch the surrounding area.
Title: Coal Pokémon

Name: Coalossal
Dex Entry: Its body is a colossal stove. With Gigantamax energy stoking the fire, this Pokémon's flame burns hotter than 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
Title: Coal Pokémon

Name: Applin
Dex Entry:
As soon as it’s born, it burrows into an apple. Not
only does the apple serve as its food source, but
the flavor of the fruit determines its evolution.
Title: Apple Core Pokémon

Name: Flapple
Dex Entry:
It flies on wings of apple skin and spits a
powerful acid. It can also change its shape
into that of an apple.
Title: Apple Wing Pokémon

Name: Flapple
Dex Entry: Under the influence of Gigantamax energy, it produces much more sweet nectar, and its shape has changed to resemble a giant apple.
Title: Apple Wing Pokémon

Name: Appletun
Dex Entry:
Its body is covered in sweet nectar, and the
skin on its back is especially yummy. Children
used to have it as a snack.
Title: Apple Nectar Pokémon

Name: Appletun
Dex Entry: Due to Gigantamax energy, this Pokémon's nectar has thickened. The increased viscosity lets the nectar absorb more damage than before.
Title: Apple Nectar Pokémon

Name: Silicobra
Dex Entry:
It spews sand from its nostrils. While the enemy
is blinded, it burrows into the ground to hide.
Title: Sand Snake Pokémon

Name: Sandaconda
Dex Entry:
Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand
out of its sand sac more efficiently.
Title: Sand Snake Pokémon

Name: Sandaconda
Dex Entry: Its sand pouch has grown to tremendous proportions. More than 1,000,000 tons of sand now swirl around its body.
Title: Sand Snake Pokémon

Name: Cramorant
Dex Entry:
This hungry Pokémon swallows Arrokuda whole.
Occasionally, it makes a mistake and tries to
swallow a Pokémon other than its preferred prey.
Title: Gulp Pokémon

Name: Arrokuda
Dex Entry:
After it’s eaten its fill, its movements become
extremely sluggish. That’s when Cramorant
swallows it up.
Title: Rush Pokémon

Name: Barraskewda
Dex Entry:
It spins its tail fins to propel itself, surging
forward at speeds of over 100 knots before
ramming prey and spearing into them.
Title: Skewer Pokémon

Name: Toxel
Dex Entry:
It manipulates the chemical makeup of its poison
to produce electricity. The voltage is weak, but it
can cause a tingling paralysis.
Title: Baby Pokémon

Name: Toxtricity
Dex Entry:
This short-tempered and aggressive Pokémon
chugs stagnant water to absorb any toxins it
might contain.
Title: Punk Pokémon

Name: Toxtricity
Dex Entry: It has an electrical organ on its chest. While generating electricity, it fills its surroundings with what sounds like the strumming of a bass guitar.
Title: Punk Pokémon

Name: Toxtricity
Dex Entry: Out of control after its own poison penetrated its brain, it tears across the land in a rampage, contaminating the earth with toxic sweat.
Title: Punk Pokémon

Name: Sizzlipede
Dex Entry:
It wraps prey up with its heated body, cooking
them in its coils. Once they’re well-done, it will
voraciously nibble them down to the last morsel.
Title: Radiator Pokémon

Name: Centiskorch
Dex Entry:
While its burning body is already dangerous on
its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has
large and very sharp fangs.
Title: Radiator Pokémon

Name: Centiskorch
Dex Entry: The heat that comes off a Gigantamax Centiskorch may destabilize air currents. Sometimes it can even cause storms.
Title: Radiator Pokémon

Name: Clobbopus
Dex Entry:
Its tentacles tear off easily, but it isn’t alarmed
when that happens—it knows they’ll grow back.
It’s about as smart as a three-year-old.
Title: Tantrum Pokémon

Name: Grapploct
Dex Entry:
Searching for an opponent to test its skills
against, it emerges onto land. Once the battle
is over, it returns to the sea.
Title: Jujitsu Pokémon

Name: Sinistea
Dex Entry:
The teacup in which this Pokémon makes its
home is a famous piece of antique tableware.
Many forgeries are in circulation.
Title: Black Tea Pokémon

Name: Polteageist
Dex Entry:
Leaving leftover black tea unattended is asking
for this Pokémon to come along and pour itself
into it, turning the tea into a new Polteageist.
Title: Black Tea Pokémon

Name: Hatenna
Dex Entry:
If this Pokémon senses a strong emotion, it
will run away as fast as it can. It prefers areas
without people.
Title: Calm Pokémon

Name: Hattrem
Dex Entry:
Using the braids on its head, it pummels foes to
get them to quiet down. One blow from those
braids would knock out a professional boxer.
Title: Serene Pokémon

Name: Hatterene
Dex Entry:
If you’re too loud around it, you risk being torn
apart by the claws on its tentacle. This Pokémon
is also known as the Forest Witch.
Title: Silent Pokémon

Name: Hatterene
Dex Entry: Beams like lightning shoot down from its tentacles. It's known to some as the Raging Goddess.
Title: Silent Pokémon

Name: Impidimp
Dex Entry:
It sneaks into people’s homes, stealing things
and feasting on the negative energy of the
frustrated occupants.
Title: Wily Pokémon

Name: Morgrem
Dex Entry:
With sly cunning, it tries to lure people into the
woods. Some believe it to have the power to
make crops grow.
Title: Devious Pokémon

Name: Grimmsnarl
Dex Entry:
Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs
unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring
them as tentacles would.
Title: Bulk Up Pokémon

Name: Grimmsnarl
Dex Entry: Gigantamax energy has caused more hair to sprout all over its body. With the added strength, it can jump over the world's tallest building.
Title: Bulk Up Pokémon

Name: Obstagoon
Dex Entry:
It evolved after experiencing numerous fights.
While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that
would make any opponent flinch.
Title: Blocking Pokémon

Name: Perrserker
Dex Entry:
After many battles, it evolved dangerous
claws that come together to form daggers
when extended.
Title: Viking Pokémon

Name: Cursola
Dex Entry:
Be cautious of the ectoplasmic body
surrounding its soul. You’ll become
stiff as stone if you touch it.
Title: Coral Pokémon

Name: Sirfetch'd
Dex Entry:
After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield,
it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk. The leek
stalk is both weapon and food.
Title: Wild Duck Pokémon

Name: Mr. Rime
Dex Entry:
Its amusing movements make it very popular.
It releases its psychic power from the pattern
on its belly.
Title: Comedian Pokémon

Name: Runerigus
Dex Entry:
Never touch its shadowlike body, or you’ll be
shown the horrific memories behind the picture
carved into it.
Title: Grudge Pokémon

Name: Milcery
Dex Entry:
They say that any patisserie visited by Milcery
is guaranteed success and good fortune.
Title: Cream Pokémon

Name: Alcremie
Dex Entry:
When Alcremie is content, the cream it
secretes from its hands becomes sweeter
and richer.
Title: Cream Pokémon

Name: Alcremie
Dex Entry: Cream pours endlessly from this Pokémon's body. The cream stiffens when compressed by an impact. A harder impact results in harder cream.
Title: Cream Pokémon

Name: Falinks
Dex Entry:
The six of them work together as one Pokémon.
Teamwork is also their battle strategy, and they
constantly change their formation as they fight.
Title: Formation Pokémon

Name: Pincurchin
Dex Entry:
It stores electricity in each spine. Even if one gets
broken off, it still continues to emit electricity for
at least three hours.
Title: Sea Urchin Pokémon

Name: Snom
Dex Entry:
It eats snow that piles up on the ground.
The more snow it eats, the bigger and more
impressive the spikes on its back grow.
Title: Worm Pokémon

Name: Frosmoth
Dex Entry:
It shows no mercy to any who desecrate fields
and mountains. It will fly around on its icy wings,
causing a blizzard to chase offenders away.
Title: Frost Moth Pokémon

Name: Stonjourner
Dex Entry:
Once a year, on a specific date and at a specific
time, they gather out of nowhere and form up in
a circle.
Title: Big Rock Pokémon

Name: Eiscue
Dex Entry:
This Pokémon keeps its heat-sensitive head cool
with ice. It fishes for its food, dangling its single
hair into the sea to lure in prey.
Title: Penguin Pokémon

Name: Eiscue
Dex Entry: The hair on its head connects to the surface of its brain. When this Pokémon has something on its mind, its hair chills the air around it.
Title: Penguin Pokémon

Name: Indeedee
Dex Entry:
Through its horns, it can pick up on the emotions
of creatures around it. Positive emotions are the
source of its strength.
Title: Emotion Pokémon

Name: Indeedee
Dex Entry: They diligently serve people and Pokémon so they can gather feelings of gratitude. The females are particularly good at babysitting.
Title: Emotion Pokémon

Name: Morpeko
Dex Entry:
It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if
they’re precious treasures. No matter how much
it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.
Title: Two-Sided Pokémon

Name: Morpeko
Dex Entry: Intense hunger drives it to extremes of violence, and the electricity in its cheek sacs has converted into a Dark-type energy.
Title: Two-Sided Pokémon

Name: Cufant
Dex Entry:
If a job requires serious strength, this Pokémon
will excel at it. Its copper body tarnishes in the
rain, turning a vibrant green color.
Title: Copperderm Pokémon

Name: Copperajah
Dex Entry:
These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have
incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush
giant rocks into powder.
Title: Copperderm Pokémon

Name: Copperajah
Dex Entry: After this Pokémon has Gigantamaxed, its massive nose can utterly demolish large structures with a single smashing blow.
Title: Copperderm Pokémon

Name: Dracozolt
Dex Entry:
The powerful muscles in its tail generate its
electricity. Compared to its lower body,
its upper half is entirely too small.
Title: Fossil Pokémon

Name: Arctozolt
Dex Entry:
This Pokémon lived on prehistoric seashores and
was able to preserve food with the ice on its
body. It went extinct because it moved so slowly.
Title: Fossil Pokémon

Name: Dracovish
Dex Entry:
Its mighty legs are capable of running at
speeds exceeding 40 mph, but this Pokémon
can’t breathe unless it’s underwater.
Title: Fossil Pokémon

Name: Arctovish
Dex Entry:
The skin on its face is impervious to attack, but
breathing difficulties made this Pokémon go
extinct anyway.
Title: Fossil Pokémon

Name: Duraludon
Dex Entry:
The special metal that composes its body is very
light, so this Pokémon has considerable agility.
It lives in caves because it dislikes the rain.
Title: Alloy Pokémon

Name: Duraludon
Dex Entry: It's grown to resemble a skyscraper. Parts of its towering body glow due to a profusion of energy.
Title: Alloy Pokémon

Name: Dreepy
Dex Entry:
If this weak Pokémon is by itself, a mere child
could defeat it. But if Dreepy has friends to help
it train, it can evolve and become much stronger.
Title: Lingering Pokémon

Name: Drakloak
Dex Entry:
Without a Dreepy to place on its head and
care for, it gets so uneasy it’ll try to substitute
any Pokémon it finds for the missing Dreepy.
Title: Caretaker Pokémon

Name: Dragapult
Dex Entry:
Apparently the Dreepy inside Dragapult’s
horns eagerly look forward to being launched out
at Mach speeds.
Title: Stealth Pokémon

Name: Zacian
Dex Entry:
This Pokémon has slumbered for many years.
Some say it’s Zamazenta’s elder sister—others
say the two Pokémon are rivals.
Title: Warrior Pokémon

Name: Zacian
Dex Entry: Able to cut down anything with a single strike, it became known as the Fairy King's Sword, and it inspired awe in friend and foe alike.
Title: Warrior Pokémon

Name: Zamazenta
Dex Entry:
This Pokémon slept for aeons while in the form of
a statue. It was asleep for so long, people forgot
that it ever existed.
Title: Warrior Pokémon

Name: Zamazenta
Dex Entry: Now that it's equipped with its shield, it can shrug off impressive blows, including the attacks of Dynamax Pokémon.
Title: Warrior Pokémon

Name: Eternatus
Dex Entry:
It was inside a meteorite that fell 20,000 years
ago. There seems to be a connection between
this Pokémon and the Dynamax phenomenon.
Title: Gigantic Pokémon

Name: Eternatus
Dex Entry: Infinite amounts of energy pour from this Pokémon's enlarged core, warping the surrounding space-time.
Title: Gigantic Pokémon

Name: Kubfu
Dex Entry:
If Kubfu pulls the long white hair on its head,
its fighting spirit heightens and power wells up
from the depths of its belly.
Title: Wushu Pokémon

Name: Urshifu
Dex Entry:
Inhabiting the mountains of a distant region, this
Pokémon races across sheer cliffs, training its legs
and refining its moves.
Title: Wushu Pokémon

Name: Urshifu
Dex Entry: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in defeating foes by raining many blows down on them. Its strikes are nonstop, flowing like a river.
Title: Wushu Pokémon

Name: Urshifu
Dex Entry: The energy released by this Pokémon's fists forms shock waves that can blow away Dynamax Pokémon in just one hit.
Title: Wushu Pokémon

Name: Urshifu
Dex Entry: As it waits for the right moment to unleash its Gigantamax power, this Pokémon maintains a perfect one-legged stance. It won't even twitch.
Title: Wushu Pokémon

Name: Zarude
Dex Entry:
Once the vines on Zarude’s body tear off, they
become nutrients in the soil. This helps the plants
of the forest grow.
Title: Rogue Monkey Pokémon

Name: Regieleki
Dex Entry:
Its entire body is made up of a single organ that
generates electrical energy. Regieleki is capable
of creating all Galar’s electricity.
Title: Electron Pokémon

Name: Regidrago
Dex Entry:
Its body is composed of crystallized dragon
energy. Regidrago is said to have the powers of
every dragon Pokémon.
Title: Dragon Orb Pokémon

Name: Glastrier
Dex Entry:
Glastrier has tremendous physical strength, and
the mask of ice covering its face is 100 times
harder than diamond.
Title: Wild Horse Pokémon

Name: Spectrier
Dex Entry:
As it dashes through the night, Spectrier absorbs
the life-force of sleeping creatures. It craves
silence and solitude.
Title: Swift Horse Pokémon

Name: Calyrex
Dex Entry:
Calyrex is known in legend as a king that ruled
over Galar in ancient times. It has the power to
cause hearts to mend and plants to spring forth.
Title: King Pokémon

Name: Calyrex
Dex Entry: According to lore, this Pokémon showed no mercy to those who got in its way, yet it would heal its opponents' wounds after battle.
Title: High King Pokémon

Name: Calyrex
Dex Entry: Legend says that by using its power to see all events from past to future, this Pokémon saved the creatures of a forest from a meteorite strike.
Title: High King Pokémon

Name: Wyrdeer
Dex Entry:
The black orbs shine with an uncanny light when the Pokémon is
erecting invisible barriers. The fur shed from its beard retains
heat well and is a highly useful material for winter clothing.
Title: Big Horn Pokémon

Name: Kleavor
Dex Entry:
A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes
and shields itself with hard stone. If one should chance upon
this Pokémon in the wilds, one's only recourse is to flee.
Title: Axe Pokémon

Name: Ursaluna
Dex Entry:
Hisui's swampy terrain gave Ursaluna its
burly physique and newfound capacity to manipulate peat
at will.
Title: Peat Pokémon

Name: Ursaluna
Dex Entry: This special Ursaluna can see in the dark with its left eye and protects itself with mud that is as hard as iron.
Title: Peat Pokémon

Name: Basculegion
Dex Entry: It can jump with incredible power. Parts of its body are tinged red by the rage of its fallen friends.
Title: Big Fish Pokémon

Name: Basculegion
Dex Entry: It can afflict a target with terrifying illusions that are under its control. The deeper the sadness in its friends' souls, the paler Basculegion becomes.
Title: Big Fish Pokémon

Name: Sneasler
Dex Entry:
Because of Sneasler's virulent poison and daunting physical
prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen
highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.
Title: Free Climb Pokémon

Name: Overqwil
Dex Entry:
Its lancelike spikes and savage temperament have earned it the
nickname ”sea fiend.” It slurps up poison to nourish itself.
Title: Pin Cluster Pokémon

Name: Enamorus
Dex Entry:
When it flies to this land from across the sea, the bitter winter
comes to an end. According to legend, this Pokémon's love
gives rise to the budding of fresh life across Hisui.
Title: Love-Hate Pokémon

Name: Enamorus
Dex Entry: A different guise from its feminine humanoid form. From the clouds, it descends upon those who treat any form of life with disrespect and metes out wrathful, ruthless punishment.
Title: Love-Hate Pokémon

Name: Sprigatito
Dex Entry: The sweet scent its body gives off mesmerizes those around it. The scent grows stronger when this Pokémon is in the sun.
Title: Grass Cat Pokémon

Name: Floragato
Dex Entry: The hardness of Floragato’s fur depends on the Pokémon’s mood. When Floragato is prepared to battle, its fur becomes pointed and needle sharp.
Title: Grass Cat Pokémon

Name: Meowscarada
Dex Entry: With skillful misdirection, it rigs foes with pollen-packed flower bombs. Meowscarada sets off the bombs before its foes realize what’s going on.
Title: Magician Pokémon

Name: Fuecoco
Dex Entry: Its flame sac is small, so energy is always leaking out. This energy is released from the dent atop Fuecoco’s head and flickers to and fro.
Title: Fire Croc Pokémon

Name: Crocalor
Dex Entry: The valve in Crocalor’s flame sac is closely connected to its vocal cords. This Pokémon utters a guttural cry as it spews flames every which way.
Title: Fire Croc Pokémon

Name: Skeledirge
Dex Entry: Skeledirge’s gentle singing soothes the souls of all that hear it. It burns its enemies to a crisp with flames of over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit.
Title: Singer Pokémon

Name: Quaxly
Dex Entry: Its strong legs let it easily swim around in even fast-flowing rivers. It likes to keep things tidy and is prone to overthinking things.
Title: Duckling Pokémon

Name: Quaxwell
Dex Entry: The hardworking Quaxwell observes people and Pokémon from various regions and incorporates their movements into its own dance routines.
Title: Practicing Pokémon

Name: Quaquaval
Dex Entry: Dancing in ways that evoke far-away places, this Pokémon mesmerizes all that see it. Flourishes of its decorative water feathers slice into its foes.
Title: Dancer Pokémon

Name: Lechonk
Dex Entry: This Pokémon spurns all but the finest of foods. Its body gives off an herblike scent that bug Pokémon detest.
Title: Hog Pokémon

Name: Oinkologne
Dex Entry: It entrances female Pokémon with the sweet, alluring scent that wafts from all over its body.
Title: Hog Pokémon

Name: Oinkologne
Dex Entry: This is a meticulous Pokémon that likes to keep things tidy. It shrouds itself in a floral aroma that soothes the Pokémon around it.
Title: Hog Pokémon

Name: Tarountula
Dex Entry: The thread it secretes from its rear is as strong as wire. The secret behind the thread’s strength is the topic of ongoing research.
Title: String Ball Pokémon

Name: Spidops
Dex Entry: Spidops covers its territory in tough, sticky threads to set up traps for intruders.
Title: Trap Pokémon

Name: Nymble
Dex Entry: It’s highly skilled at a fighting style in which it uses its jumping capabilities to dodge incoming attacks while also dealing damage to opponents.
Title: Grasshopper Pokémon

Name: Lokix
Dex Entry: It uses its normally folded third set of legs when in Showdown Mode. This places a huge burden on its body, so it can’t stay in this mode for long.
Title: Grasshopper Pokémon

Name: Pawmi
Dex Entry: The pads of its paws are electricity-discharging organs. Pawmi fires electricity from its forepaws while standing unsteadily on its hind legs.
Title: Mouse Pokémon

Name: Pawmo
Dex Entry: Pawmo uses a unique fighting technique in which it uses its forepaws to strike foes and zap them with electricity from its paw pads simultaneously.
Title: Mouse Pokémon

Name: Pawmot
Dex Entry: Pawmot’s fluffy fur acts as a battery. It can store the same amount of electricity as an electric car.
Title: Hands-On Pokémon

Name: Tandemaus
Dex Entry: The pair sticks together no matter what. They split any food they find exactly in half and then eat it together.
Title: Couple Pokémon

Name: Maushold
Dex Entry: The larger pair protects the little ones during battles. When facing strong opponents, the whole group will join the fight.
Title: Family Pokémon

Name: Maushold
Dex Entry: The little one just appeared one day. They all live together like a family, but the relationship between the three is still unclear.
Title: Family Pokémon

Name: Fidough
Dex Entry: The yeast in Fidough’s breath is useful for cooking, so this Pokémon has been protected by people since long ago.
Title: Puppy Pokémon

Name: Dachsbun
Dex Entry: The surface of this Pokémon’s skin hardens when exposed to intense heat, and its body has an appetizing aroma.
Title: Dog Pokémon

Name: Smoliv
Dex Entry: This Pokémon converts nutrients into oil, which it stores in the fruit on its head. It can easily go a whole week without eating or drinking.
Title: Olive Pokémon

Name: Dolliv
Dex Entry: It basks in the sun to its heart’s content until the fruits on its head ripen. After that, Dolliv departs from human settlements and goes on a journey.
Title: Olive Pokémon

Name: Arboliva
Dex Entry: This Pokémon drives back enemies by launching its rich, aromatic oil at them with enough force to smash a boulder.
Title: Olive Pokémon

Name: Squawkabilly
Dex Entry: Green-feathered flocks hold the most sway. When they’re out searching for food in the mornings and evenings, it gets very noisy.
Title: Parrot Pokémon

Name: Squawkabilly
Dex Entry: Blue-feathered Squawkabilly view their green-feathered counterparts as rivals, since the latter make up the largest, most powerful groups.
Title: Parrot Pokémon
